meanings.sent1: She couldn't resist splurging on a new dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, people often enjoy splurging on gifts for their loved ones.
meanings.sent3: After winning the lottery, he went splurging on a shopping spree.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was splurging with joy when she received the unexpected gift.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset were splurging across the sky in a breathtaking display.

meanings.definition: To indulge oneself in some luxury or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: On her day off, she treated herself by splurging on a spa day.
meanings.sent2: After a long week of work, he decided to spend the weekend splurging on good food and movies.
meanings.sent3: Instead of saving up, she chose to go splurging on a fancy dinner with friends.
meanings.sent4: The music filled the room, splurging her senses with delight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies was splurging through the house, tempting everyone.
